metadata.title: CVE-2015-3274 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the user_get_user_detailsfunction in user/lib.php in Moodle through 2.6.11, 2.7.x before 2.7.9,2.8.x before 2.8.7, and 2.9.x before 2.9.1 allows remote attackers toinject arbitrary web script or HTML by leveraging absence of anexternal_format_text call in a web service.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
